message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a wide range of features and benefits that I believe would be of great value to you. Considering its quality and functionality, I am offering it to you for $150. I hope this price aligns with your expectations and budget.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the features and benefits you mentioned.
